name: Run! Fox Run!
description:
Help the fox to run through the trail and collect grasshopper. Oh and don't get tripped on those logs and rocks too.

Run! Fox Run! is and Endless Runner game made in 1 week by Mark Anthony Fordan  - akosifords.

Controls:

Keyboard Controls : ( LEFT ) Left Arrow, ( RIGHT ) Right Arrow, ( JUMP ) Space 

Use Mouse / Touch supported

( To be ported on Android )

Tools Used:

Unity3d 2019.2.5f1 

Visual Studio Code

Blender 2.79

Gimp

Inkscape

Used Assets :

 Low Poly Nature by Quaternius

Low Poly Fox by PixelMannen and Rig by tomkranis

Grasshopper by suchada.kha
